name: Pixel Role
description:
Pixel Role
v. 0.0.8
About project: As a high school student I am currently working on project for exam. And I am looking forward to publish it as finished game. So every comment will help me! If you find bug or any, even smallest problem, I'll be very happy if u share it with me. Again because it's just prototype I am sorry for lack of content! I'll be adding bunch of it later on!!!

Lore: As a ghost/soul of former human, your trapped in soul prison. I really don't want to spoil anything else for now. But as ghost you are able to posses other creatures and gain control of them.

Gameplay: - movement - w,a,s,d / arrows
                        - aim - mouse
                        - posses - space
                        - attack - left/right mouse buttonContact: email - simon.hruz252@gmail.com                      discord - GreyHorse#9350
